mapper.insert: insert into PF_RESRELATION (CDYZYGXZJ, ZDXBM, ZDXLX, CDXBM, CDXLX) values (#{cdyzygxzj,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{zdxbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdxlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdxbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdxlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PF_RESRELATION WHERE ZDXBM = #{zdxbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ZDXLX = #{zdxlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
